targets.query: SELECT "download-bandwidth" AS "download" FROM "speedtest-results" WHERE ("server-name" =~ /^$TestServer$/ AND "hostname" =~ /^$hostname$/) AND $timeFilter

SELECT "hostname" as Device, "server-location" as Location, "server-name" as Server, "server-id", "url", "Ping", max("Download") AS "Download", "Upload", "Combined", "Public IP" FROM (SELECT "download-bandwidth" + "upload-bandwidth" AS Combined, "result-url" AS "url", "latency" AS "Ping", "download-bandwidth" AS "Download", "upload-bandwidth" AS "Upload", "external-IP" AS "Public IP" FROM "speedtest-results" WHERE ("server-name" =~ /^$TestServer$/ AND "hostname" =~ /^$hostname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "hostname", "server-name", "server-location", "server-id")

SELECT "hostname" as Device, "server-location" as Location, "server-name" as Server, "server-id", "url", "Ping", "Download", max("Upload") as Upload, "Combined", "Public IP" FROM (SELECT "download-bandwidth" + "upload-bandwidth" AS Combined, "result-url" AS "url", "latency" AS "Ping", "download-bandwidth" AS "Download", "upload-bandwidth" AS "Upload", "external-IP" AS "Public IP" FROM "speedtest-results" WHERE ("server-name" =~ /^$TestServer$/ AND "hostname" =~ /^$hostname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "hostname", "server-name", "server-location", "server-id")

SELECT "hostname" as Device, "server-location" as Location, "server-name" as Server, "server-id", "url", "Ping", "Download", "Upload", max(Combined) AS "Combined", "Public IP" FROM (SELECT "download-bandwidth" + "upload-bandwidth" AS Combined, "result-url" AS "url", "latency" AS "Ping", "download-bandwidth" AS "Download", "upload-bandwidth" AS "Upload", "external-IP" AS "Public IP" FROM "speedtest-results" WHERE ("server-name" =~ /^$TestServer$/ AND "hostname" =~ /^$hostname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "hostname", "server-name", "server-location", "server-id")

SELECT "hostname" as Device, "server-location" as Location, "server-name" as Server, "server-id", "url", "Ping", "Download", "Upload", "Combined", "Public IP" FROM (SELECT "result-url" AS "url", "latency" AS "Ping", "download-bandwidth" AS "Download", "upload-bandwidth" AS "Upload", "download-bandwidth" + "upload-bandwidth" AS "Combined", "external-IP" AS "Public IP" FROM "speedtest-results" WHERE ("server-name" =~ /^$TestServer$/ AND "hostname" =~ /^$hostname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "hostname", "server-name", "server-location", "server-id")
